In this policy, we lay out: what data we collect and why; how your data is handled; and your rights with respect to your data.
We may also access your data if required in order to respond to legal processes (see "When required under applicable law" below).
When we access or share your information

We may share your information at your direction if you integrate a third-party service into your use of our products.
We occasionally use aggregate billing information to guide our marketing efforts.
We collect information about your browsing activity for analytics and statistical purposes such as conversion rate testing and experimenting with new product designs.
Credit card information is submitted directly to our payment processor and doesn't hit Loop servers.
